title: MQTTWillProperties (Struct)
text:
TYPE MQTTWillProperties : STRUCT
Will properties (MQTT V5)

rows.Name: udiMessageExpiryInterval
rows.Comment: Expiry interval of the message in seconds

rows.Name: wsContentType
rows.Comment: MIME style content type of the payload

rows.Name: wsResponseTopic
rows.Comment:
Some applications or standards might wish to run a Request/Response interaction over MQTT.
The Resopnse Topic can be used for this purpose.

rows.Name: udiCorrelationDataSize
rows.Comment: Size of the correlation data buffer|paCorrelationData|

rows.Name: paCorrelationData
rows.Comment:
Pointer to correlation data buffer. The Correlation Data is
used by the sender of the Request Message to identify which
request the Response Message is for when it is received.

rows.Name: udiWillDelayInterval
rows.Comment:
The Server delays publishing the Clientâs Will Message until the Will Delay Interval (in seconds)
has passed or the Session ends, whichever happens first.
